nodes.text: The Mobile XR-1 was an armor integrated set of slicing gear manufactured by MerenData.

Able to be integrated into any set of armor, the Mobile XR-1 consisted of integrating a customized computer, dataports, and gesture interface circuitry into a given piece of worn armor - making it so that a given user's slicing tools were always at hand and impossible to lose. Visor-mounted Heads-up displays or holographic image streams slicing functions and data, while specially designed gloves or gauntlets allow the slicer to manipulate code and functions with little more than gestures and brief voice commands.
The Mobile XR-1 was first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
